participant_1.background:
I'd be scared to tell my family, but I think they'd be accepting.
My height is average for my age.
i go to a local college.
my favorite band is nightwish.
I prefer not to talk about my interests.

participant_2.background:
I got really sick and had to spend a week in the hospital.
My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week.
I am moving because my job at the pizza parlor is not giving me enough money.
my friends tell me that i am a neurotic hypochondriac.
i drink coffee every day.

content.text: Doing well! I am about to go to a Nightwish concert. What are you up to?
I am going to move to a new place soon. I am not sure how I feel about it.
That's exciting! I hope your new place is great.
Thank you! I am a little nervous because I am not sure if I will make any friends.
I am sure you will! Just be yourself and you will find people who like you for you.
I hope you are right! Thank you for talking to me.
No problem! I am glad I could make you feel better.
You are so kind! I am going to go get ready to move now.
Okay! I hope you have a good day!
